text: Hello, Have you ever donated to a charity?
A few times, yes.
ow was your experience?
It was ok. I didn't really think much of it. Most of the time its just a dollar or two.
Do you donate all te time?h
Not so much.
Have yu heard of \\Save the children? It is pretty well known around the world.
I think so.
What do you think that they do?
Give money to child. Support efforts in war torn countries. Healthcare. All that stuff.
eah, pretty much and it gives you the good feels kowing that you have helped to change a childs life
You could say that.
I plan to make a sizeable donation today as a mattter of fact and wondering if you would like to join me so that the doatiowould go eve further than if just one person doates?nn nn
Maybe. I am not sure yet.
What concerns do you have about the charity?
Where the money goes. Lots of charities have massive ''administration'' cost.
Well, i don't have all of the exact details but i can honestly tell you that it will be sent directly to the charity so that they can dispurse it accordingly.
Hm. I see.

Plus, just like all other charities it takes a lot of faith to send money and Save the Children is the type that relys on faith since they have been around for many years. This experience is what makes me continue to donate to them. So would you like to donate? If you would, how much would you like to donate with me?
Well, that depends what you are going to donate.
I plan to donate 50 cents
Sounds like a plan.
Nice So we will each donate 50 cents, right?
Yes 50 cents
Great!@ Thanks so much and God bless you!
